description:
Tree pruning in the Hillmarton Conservation area.

Notification has been recieved to carry out the folowing works to a Lime tree growing at the fronmt boundary of 81 Hartham Road, N7 9JJ.
Crown reduce by up to 30%
Prune to clear property to give 2.5m clearance
Prune back basal growth.
decision_conditions: 81 Hartham Road is situated in the Hillmarton Conservation area. In the exercise of planning powers, section 72(1) of the Planning (listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 requires special attention to be paid to the desirability of preserving or enhancing the character or appearance of conservation areas. The specification for tree pruning has been negotiated with the ree owner from a 50 % crown reduction to the lesser works of up to a 30% crown reduction, this is to maintain the important visual amenity that this tree provides.
